title: Common Transmission Model (CTM) Time Series Data Schema

time_series_data.description: structure to contain all time variant data of the system/case. All time series are synchronized to the same timestamps, which should should be stored using Unix time. Structure is quasi-tabular, with uid, name, path_to_file, values, and source_uid being arrays in the same order of said field. This is done in order to allow for better compression (e.g., using HDF5) for the values field.

timestamp.description: [seconds] seconds since epoch (Unix time) for each instant for which time series values are provided

uid.description: array of uids of time series

name.description: array of names of time series

path_to_file.description: path to file containing all time series information or a separate path for each time series

items.description: time series values for a particular time series

source_uid.description: additional time series information not currently supported by CTM
